reviewText: Even though I remember the cabbage patch Christmas being better as a kid I'm still glad this is out on DVD and will be purchasing it. As a kid I remember really liking the cabbage patch episode but now seeing it as a adult it's just ok, but I still have to get it because it's a great Christmas memory. I don't remember ever seeing the troll one, so hopefully it's a good one and I can see if my boys end up liking it. Don't think they will like the cabbage patch one though cause I guess it's more for girls then boys haha.

I don't remember the Cabbage Patch movie--although I'm sure I watched it as a child. (That's why I only gave my review 4 stars) But The Little Troll Prince was one we taped off TV and then watched every year until we wore it out. I've been searching for a copy ever since!!! I'm so excited it's finally on DVD. It has sweet music and a sweet original story that has stuck with me my whole life.  I can't wait to share it with my children. And it tells the TRUE story of Christmas, and how the power of the story can change us forever.
The movie is in excellent condition. There was normal wear and tear to the box as described by the seller. I am very satisfied and would purchase from this seller again!

After searching everywhere for this VHS, i could only locate it on amazon. Very happy to add this to my collection of childhood favourites, especially come christmas time! Tape was second hand as stated, was in great condition, fast shipping to Australia. Very happy. It's just a shame i cannot find it on DVD.
I hope to find more of the Christmas season specials I looked forward to every year...this story had a wonderful message of acceptance and living a good moral life...5 stars!

i think all tapes should turn into dvds because that is the trend.also put it for a good price.i only buy dvds and not tapes.so please put it on dvd because i liked this movie when i was a kid and i still like it.
Cabbage Patch Kids are a BIG part of my childhood! I have to find these tapes!!!!!! PLEASE help me!!!!
So excited when this arrived! I loved this when I was a kid! So much fun to watch it with my kids!
It always makes my holiday when I can find a Christmas cartoon on DVD I grew up watching.
Great Movie
The Little Troll Prince is what I bought this movie for and its as cute as I remember
I bought this because it contains the Little Troll Prince. It is a wonderful Christmas movie that seems to have been long forgotten. I was ecstatic when I found it included on this DVD!!
Grew up watching this and was glad to add to my collection.
The Troll Prince is a movie from my childhood. It's got a wonderful message and some sweet (and memorable) music. Just played it for my kiddos and when it was done they asked to watch it again! :)
Arrived quickly. Really just ordered for The Little Troll Prince. Excited to add a childhood favorite to my collection for my children.

I bought this for the Little Troll Prince which I remember really liking when I was little boy was I disappointed!  I found the show really annoying and I didn't even venture to watch the Cabbage Patch Kids.  I'd say look at the other Christmas Classics this one is NOT worth it.
Love it .... takes me back to my childhood in the early 80's.
love it great movie for christmas
Love The Littke Troll Prince. Watched it so much as a kid but have had a hard time finding it for a reasonable price. Very happy with purchase!

I've been married 18+ years, and every Christmas, my wife would search feverishly for The Little Troll Prince, because it was one of her fond memories growing up.  Imagine her delight when I presented this to her on Christmas Eve.  She remembered every song they sang, even though it's been so long since she's seen it.  Scored me some major brownie points.

I LOVED the little troll prince when I was a kid. I taped in off of tv onto a video tape back in the 90's. I literally watched it until it could no longer play. For YEARS, I have searched for this movie on Cartoon network, DVD, anything other than VHS. When I saw this I screamed with excitement!!! I finally found it!!! It is a cute story about a nice little troll prince who lives with other mean trolls who don't like him much because he is too kind. His father is king and him and his family are expected to be bad trolls, they even attend a "sinister school" that teaches them to be bad and mean. The nice troll prince get tied to a tree by his mean troll family and the tree is cut down by a cute little family celebrating Christmas. They show him how to love and the meaning of Christmas. It has some religious influences, being a Christmas movie it tells the story of Jesus, etc. It is cute and has cute little songs. My five year old LOVED it!!! The Cabbage Patch kids movie I had never heared of though... I have not watched it yet. Bought this for the little troll prince and I am so happy I did.

Defective. Can't play the end of either movie, there's some sort of manufacturing bubbled defect inside of the DVD. Didn't find out until return window closed (never tried to watch until now). Big disappointment.
Loved this movie as a kid!
Reminiscent of my childhood
I love the Little Troll Prince.  Wonderful for children.
A favorite movie of mine as a child, watch it with my daughter now and she loves it!

I bought this for the other video "The Little Troll Prince".  I have used this with children in a day care setting for about 25 years and had lost my original.  A grand daughter found it on Amazon and told me about it. I love the message that "God loves everyone.  Even evil Trolls!"

I've been waiting years for the cabbage patch Christmas cartoon to come out on DVD.  I loved it when I was a little girl, and I knew my daughter would love it too.  I'm so glad she is still the right age to watch it, and as I predicted she did love it.  It was just as I remembered.  Yes, it gets a little corny sometimes, but it gave me that wonderful Christmas feeling I remember as a child.  I'm glad this cartoon will now become a tradition with my daughter too.

Love this movie. I purchased 3 of these because as a child we watched the Troll Prince every Christmas. I gave them as gifts and everyone loved them! We were all excited to finally find the Troll Prince on DVD!

An old loved favourite from when i was young...still a good movie, thanks. Fast delivery was great too !!
Excellent

I bought it for the Little Troll Prince. It was a favorite Christmas for me growing up, Probably won't ever watch the Cabbage Patch Kids, but the Little Troll Prince is a great Christian story for kids

Ahh the memories! I watched Cabbage Patch Kids First Christmas when it originally aired in 1984. I loved it then, and I still do 30 years later. Thank you SO much for bringing back a fun Christmas favorite!
i was very pleased with this item and the delivery was speedy,

My review is for "The Little Troll Prince," as I have no interest in the Cabbage Patch Kids Christmas special also included on this DVD. I loved "Troll Prince" as a kid and really wanted to share it with my niece. I'm so happy I now can own it on DVD and can relive those childhood memories for years to come. It is a great story about the true meaning of Christmas, the birth of Jesus. Also, the songs are pretty catchy. I highly recommend this movie as a great way to get in the Christmas spirit.
Thank You So Much I Love them
80s classics. Can't go wrong with the Little Troll Prince. Christian underlying story though if you are not into that sort of religion, but the songs are catchy and my family enjoys it.
this is good two classic specials in one dvd  and its good for christmas

i remember this as a child!! very cute christmas cartoon, i wish they would sell it on dvd.  quality was excellent for the video.

My grandchildren loved this DVD and were especially spellbound by The Little Troll Prince. I have ordered five copies to give to other families with young children, and I may order more. What a superb gift!

The rating is for The Little Troll Prince only.  I have never watched Cabbage Patch Kids and will NEVER watch the Cabbage Patch Kids.  We have watched The Little Troll Prince for many years and have never found it on DVD.  My daughter found it on this DVD and that's why I bought it.
The Little Troll Prince tells the true story of Christmas in an entertaining way.
